Question: This attack was diagnosed as possibly "epileptiform" and this personl himself later wrote of his "seizures" in the same diary.
Hints: This paper, known as the "cut pages in diary document", was compiled by various members of this personl's family after his death.
The fame of his alter ego "this personl" soon spread around the world.
The elder of these sons – yet another Charles Dodgson – was this personl's father.
